org.lwjgl.ovr

Class OVRHmdDesc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRHmdDesc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class OVRHmdDesc
extends Struct
    A complete descriptor of the HMD.

    ovrHmdDesc members

    MemberTypeDescription
    TypeovrHmdTypethis HMD's type
    *char[4]
    ProductNamechar[64]name string describing the product: "Oculus Rift DK1", etc.
    Manufacturerchar[64]string describing the manufacturer. Usually "Oculus".
    VendorIdshortHID Vendor ID of the device
    ProductIdshortHID Product ID of the device
    SerialNumberchar[24]sensor (and display) serial number
    FirmwareMajorshortsensor firmware major version number
    FirmwareMinorshortsensor firmware minor version number
    CameraFrustumHFovInRadiansfloathorizontal field-of-view
    CameraFrustumVFovInRadiansfloatvertical field-of-view
    CameraFrustumNearZInMetersfloatnear clip distance
    CameraFrustumFarZInMetersfloatfar clip distance
    AvailableHmdCapsunsigned intcapability bits described by ovrHmdCaps which the HMD currently supports
    DefaultHmdCapsunsigned intcapability bits described by ovrHmdCaps which are default for the current Hmd
    AvailableTrackingCapsunsigned intcapability bits described by ovrTrackingCaps which the system currently supports
    DefaultTrackingCapsunsigned intcapability bits described by ovrTrackingCaps which are default for the current system
    DefaultEyeFovovrFovPort[2]the recommended optical FOV for the HMD
    MaxEyeFovovrFovPort[2]the maximum optical FOV for the HMD
    ResolutionovrSizeiresolution of the full HMD screen (both eyes) in pixels
    DisplayRefreshRatefloatnominal refresh rate of the display in cycles per second at the time of HMD creation
    *char[4]

    • Constructor Detail

      • OVRHmdDesc

        public OVRHmdDesc(long struct)
        Creates a OVRHmdDesc instance at the specified memory address.

      • OVRHmdDesc

        public OVRHmdDesc(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a OVRHmdDesc instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
